name: Sandhyavandanam
0:
”Alexa open sandhyavandanam directions”
”Alexa play sandhyavandanam directions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sandhyavandanam directions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Sandhya vandanam. By simply asking, "Alexa, open sandhyavandanam directions" or "Alexa, begin sandhyavandanam directions"

Please use the following example phrases when using sandhyavandanam directions

Alexa,open sandhyavandanam directions
Alexa,ask sandhyavandanam directions
Alexa,play sandhyavandanam directions

Alexa will play sandhyavandanam

This skill contains sandhyavandanam slokas of Sanskrit languages.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
